messages.title: My background, my mission
messages.content: I've lived in this area for over 20 years. I work in a supermarket - I'm not a career politician. I understand the things that matter to local people. That helps me to fight for all of us, especially those who've lost out most under the Tory-led Lib Dem-backed Coalition. That will be my mission as your MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to maintain and improve the NHS, and keep it public.
Work for more affordable homes in the area, both to rent and to buy.
Campaign for a better environment, and press for urgent action to improve air quality throughout London.
Work to open up more and better opportunities for young people, and fair pay for all.
Listen to residents and help you get the best from our public services â€“ working for you whomever you vote for.

issues.environment: Campaign for a better environment, and press for urgent action to improve air quality throughout London.
issues.health: Fight to maintain and improve the NHS, and keep it public.
